mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membership (order_no, user_id, buy_date, deadline, grade) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{buyDate}, #{deadline}, #{grade})
mapper.update: UPDATE membership SET order_no = #{orderNo}, user_id = #{userId}, buy_date = #{buyDate}, deadline = #{deadline}, grade = #{grade} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
